Bei fehlender Einwilligung ist der Famil: Where consent has not been given, the certificate on page 2 of this form must also be filled out and submitted to the Family Payments Office; the same applies for cases of registration with a municipal institution or job center administered by a municipal authority.
Bitte beachten Sie die Hinweise auf der: Please take into account the notes on the following page!
Bitte beachten Sie, dass für das genannt: Please note that the form "Statement of Completion of Education and Employment" (KG 5d) or the attachment "Application for Child Benefit" (KG 1) must also be filled out and submitted for the named child along with this form.

Einwilligung zum Zugriff und zur Verarbe: Consent to accessing and processing of information pertaining to the child that is stored at the relevant institution (employment agency or job center as a joint institution)
Hinweis nach dem Bundesdatenschutzgesetz: Note on Federal Data Protection Act. This data will be collected, processed and used due to and for the purposes of Sections 31 and 62-78 of the Income Tax Act and according to the rules of the tax code, the Federal Child Benefit Act and the social insurance code. We guarantee that we have provided all information truthfully. We are aware that we must inform the Family Payments Office without delay of any changes that are relevant to our entitlement to Child Benefit.
Ich bin damit einverstanden, dass die Fa: I consent to the Family Payments Office's use of - and where possible direct access to and taking of - my information stored at the relevant institution (employment agency or job center) that is relevant to the decision on entitlement to Child Benefit. This consent can be withdrawn at any point in the future.
